EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to Finance when the Account the booking is related to is "On Hold"
EmailTemplate.name: Account on Stop Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Account} is on Hold, Please Investigate
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To Finance Team,
We have received a new booking for the client, {!Opportunity.Account}, which is currently on hold.
Please investigate why the account is on hold and remove the hold on the account if possible so we can proceed with the booking.
Thank you,
Customer Service Team
